name: Interactive Posts
author: Hasani Rogers

sections.description: Interactive Posts Package Manager (IPPM) brings packages to WordPress. A package is a zip file containing assets such as CSS, JavaScript, and images. You can attach the CSS and JavaScript script to a post by adding a package to it. From there you may enhance the experience of posts to whatever your heart desires with beautiful animations and interactive experiences.
sections.installation: Upload the Interactive Posts plugin to your blog, activate it, and done.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1 Fixed several minor directory and empty array bugs.
1.0.2 Optimize builds. Fixed several bugs.

short_description: Interactive Posts allows you to upload and attach assets to posts from packages enhancing the experience of any post.
description: Interactive Posts Package Manager (IPPM) brings packages to WordPress. A package is a zip file containing assets such as CSS, JavaScript, and images. You can attach the CSS and JavaScript script to a post by adding a package to it. From there you may enhance the experience of posts to whatever your heart desires with beautiful animations and interactive experiences.

ippm/assets-manager.name: ippm/assets-manager
ippm/assets-manager.title: IPPM: Assets
ippm/assets-manager.description: Add CSS and or JavaScript to a post.

ippm/dependencies-manager.name: ippm/dependencies-manager
ippm/dependencies-manager.title: IPPM: Dependencies
ippm/dependencies-manager.description: Add JavaScript dependencies to a post.
